entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 07:30 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: NNE 50 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
